response.overview: Miraj is a thrilling story of a middle aged man fighting his inner demons as he stumbles upon a stranger who leads him to an adventurous journey through a thick forest. Fighting nature in its wildest form, Miraj goes through a lot of hair raising and life threatening situations, fighting his own battle with the outer and the inner conflicts. Will he survive the night? And is this stranger a friend or a predator? who is he?
response.title: MIRAJ
